meanings.definition: To exert (oneself) too much or too forcefully.
meanings.sent1: After overexerting himself at the gym, he felt very tired and sore.
meanings.sent2: She knew she was overexerting when she started feeling dizzy and lightheaded.
meanings.sent3: The little boy was overexerting to reach the cookie jar on the top shelf.
meanings.sent4: Her attempts to impress her boss by overexerting only led to burnout.
meanings.sent5: Overexerting during the marathon caused him to collapse at the finish line.

meanings.definition: To strain or push beyond one's physical limits.
meanings.sent1: Overexerting while lifting heavy boxes can lead to back injuries.
meanings.sent2: He risked overexerting himself by trying to carry all the groceries in one trip.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel was overexerting to carry the oversized acorn up the tree.
meanings.sent4: She felt like she was overexerting her brain trying to solve the difficult puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The athlete ended up overexerting his muscles during the intense workout.
